alert.note: Alert for Central Sacramento Valley; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 5:52PM PDT by NWS Sacramento
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of west central Plumas, southeastern Tehama and northwestern Butte Counties through 645 PM PDT... At 551 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Tobin to Forest Ranch. These storms were moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Chico, Stirling City, Storrie, De Sabla Powerhouse, Belden, Forest Ranch, Lovelock, Richardson Springs, Bald Eagle Mountain, Vina, Tobin and Magalia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Sacramento Valley; Northeast Foothills, Sacramento Valley; Northern Sacramento Valley; Western Plumas County, Lassen Park
